H0.text: Which TV series was won by a man named Paddy Doherty on September 8th this year. Big Brother UK

H1.text: Which TV series was won by a man named Paddy Doherty on September 8th this year. Britain's Got Talent

H2.text: Which TV series was won by a man named Paddy Doherty on September 8th this year. The X Factor UK

H3.text: Which TV series was won by a man named Paddy Doherty on September 8th this year. CBBUK

A4.text: The series began on 8 October 2023, with a 90‑minute pre‑recorded launch show airing simultaneously on ITV1 and ITV2, with the remainder of the series being broadcast six nights a week on the latter channel.

A5.text: On 17 November 2023, Jordan Sangha was announced as the winner of the series, beating Olivia Young who finished as runner‑up.
